special_abilities.name: Contract Petals
special_abilities.desc: As a bonus action on its turn, the plant can contract its petals to protect itself. When it does so, its AC is set to 18 until the beginning of its next turn. It can only use this feature if it did not take damage during the last round.

actions.name: Poison Cloud
actions.desc: Area of Effect Attack: Each creature within 10ft of the poison spitter must make a DC 14 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes 1d10 poison damage and is poisoned. On a successful save the creature takes half damage.

actions.name: Poison Spray
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range 60/240ft., one target. Hit 6 (1d6 + 2) poison damage.
